MYTHIC_TAGLINE: All strength must answer to measure.
DESCRIPTION: Nomos declares that Fate faltered because power exceeded its proper place. Balance is not hoped for; it is enforced through law, proportion, and strict structure. Order rewards alignment, exactness, and controlled outcomes—repairing the world by making it predictable and legible.
CORE_PROPERTIES_MECHANICAL: Exact-count conditions; lane rules; power normalization; silence/deny ongoing; buffs tied to formation/fullness/solitude; deterministic targeting and thresholds.
CORE_PROPERTIES_THEMATIC: Control; hierarchy; symmetry; discipline; civic authority; the Olympian impulse to legislate reality into stability.
PLAYER_ROLE_IN_SCENARIO: Enforcer of Fate: you impose a measurable order on the board, making the chaotic fracture behave as a system again.
WHAT_IT_FIXES: Stabilizes outcomes; prevents runaway stacking; creates reliable win lines through structure.
WHAT_IT_BREAKS: Suppresses improvisation; punishes creativity and variance; risks turning heroism into compliance and removing the exceptional.
PRIMARY_COUNTERS: Movement/displacement that breaks formations; sacrifice engines that ignore restrictions by converting loss into gain.
VISUAL_LANGUAGE: Marble geometry; gold scales; clean sigils; straight beams of light; locking runes; crisp chimes; orderly UI frames.
SIGNATURE_KEYWORDS_EXAMPLES: EXACTLY/ONLY; FORMATION; QUOTA; CENSURE; SILENCE; MEASURE; DECREE

DESCRIPTION: Katabasis insists Fate broke because endings were evaded and losses were denied. Meaning returns only when power has a price: sacrifice, destruction, and debt paid in blood, time, or certainty. It repairs the fracture by making every gain accountable—turning ruin into fuel and inevitability into advantage.
CORE_PROPERTIES_MECHANICAL: Destroy-for-benefit; death triggers; delayed payoff; conversion (gain destroyed power); global toll counters; debuffs tied to sacrifice; token creation from death; suppression of death-prevention.
CORE_PROPERTIES_THEMATIC: Inevitability; sacrifice; consequence; underworld law; solemn commerce of lives; the truth that all victories must be paid.
PLAYER_ROLE_IN_SCENARIO: Auditor of Fate: you restore meaning by forcing costs, transforming loss into leverage, and proving that unpriced power cannot endure.
WHAT_IT_FIXES: Stops “free value”; restores consequence; makes the board state meaningful through irreversible decisions.
WHAT_IT_BREAKS: Can spiral into cruelty and optimization of sacrifice; makes collateral acceptable; risks normalizing destruction as routine.
PRIMARY_COUNTERS: Silence/edict effects that disable engines; movement that denies targets and disrupts planned sacrifices.
VISUAL_LANGUAGE: Obsidian and ash; green underflame; coin glint; drifting cinders; grave-bloom motes; slow sinking animations; toll marks.
SIGNATURE_KEYWORDS_EXAMPLES: DESTROY; OFFER; DEBT; REQUIEM; HARVEST; FINALITY; GRAVE-BLOOM

DESCRIPTION: Kinesis claims Fate shattered when paths froze—roles ossified, borders hardened, power stagnated. The cure is movement: displacement, reshaping, and refusing permanence. It repairs the world by keeping everything in circulation, making control temporary and momentum decisive.
CORE_PROPERTIES_MECHANICAL: Move/self-move; displace enemy; swap/relay; momentum checks (moved this turn); temporary locks (vanishing path); reactive reposition; buffs tied to motion and empty space.
CORE_PROPERTIES_THEMATIC: Change; flux; liminality; messenger roads; tides and revels; freedom as necessity; impermanence as truth.
PLAYER_ROLE_IN_SCENARIO: Pathbreaker of Fate: you exploit fracture-lines, break territorial certainty, and win by making positions unreliable and timing decisive.
WHAT_IT_FIXES: Prevents stagnation; breaks entrenched control; creates new lines of play through relocation and tempo.
WHAT_IT_BREAKS: Erodes commitment and stability; undermines ownership; can make victories feel fleeting and sacred things unguardable.
PRIMARY_COUNTERS: Formation locks and anti-move rules; destruction engines that profit from constant churn and attrition.
VISUAL_LANGUAGE: Wind streaks; wave arcs; feather trails; ripple distortions; quick lateral motion; blink transitions; swirling highlights.
SIGNATURE_KEYWORDS_EXAMPLES: MOVE; DISPLACE; RELAY; SHIFT; SLIPSTREAM; MOMENTUM; VANISHING-PATH
